title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: When modifying the default value of a list box in a report parameter, the default value gets lost. Steps to reproduce the issue are as follows:
OB: The default value of the list box in the report parameter is lost after modifying it.
EB: The default value of the list box in the report parameter should remain unchanged after modifying it.
SR: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', then set 'aa' as the default value and click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog to verify if the default value is still 'aaa'.
